title: Hope oce ROIT is really cleaning the game environment.
body:
[NAME REMOVED] this player is trolling in oce diamond game. 
[LINK REMOVED] his opgg link

replies.body: They aren't. You'll only be banned for using the chat in a negative or "EXCESSIVE" way. Trust me, i've been banned a few times :')

> [{quoted}](name=Ethvn,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=TTE6hBvi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-05T02:11:15.206+0000)
>
> They aren't. You'll only be banned for using the chat in a negative or "EXCESSIVE" way. Trust me, i've been banned a few times :')

Pretty much this, no such thing as banning of trolls, just for "negative" chat input.
